snippet: Mexican officials say two worn-out bolts on a gas tanker truck caused a leak that resulted in a deadly explosion at a Mexico City maternity hospital on Jan. 29.
abstract: Mexican prosecutor Rodolfo Rios says 2 cracked bolts let propane gas leak from a tanker truck causing Jan 29 explosion killing 5 people, wounding dozens and destroying most of Mexico City maternity hospital; investigation highlights hazards of improperly repaired and maintained propane gas tankers.
lead_paragraph: Mexican officials say two worn-out bolts on a gas tanker truck caused a leak that resulted in a deadly explosion at a Mexico City maternity hospital on Jan. 29.

headline.main: Mexico: Bad Bolts on Gas Tanker Led to Blast That Killed 5 at Hospital
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Bad Bolts on Gas Tanker Led to Blast That Killed 5 at Hospital

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Hospital Materno Infantil Cuajimalpa (Mexico City, Mexico)
